A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This film shows us ways that we never could have imagined with the force. This film has callbacks to other films\, but it feels so original still. This is easily one of the best Star Wars films there is.

This film is still not flawless though\, it has a subplot with Finn and Rose that seems to kind of stop the film.

But other than that this is a super fun film with amazing visuals and goergous dierecting great acting and it gives me everything I wanted in a Star Wars movie\, and then it gave me even more.

I would give Star Wars: The Last Jedi an...

A
